sub_title: Senior Product Manager | Product Strategist | Project Manager
summary:
✉️ lilikfs@hotmail.com
-> www.lilianfagundes.com

I started my career in marketing area with Branding developments project. Over the past few years, I have worked in diverse professional environments, founding one company and improving my capacity to develop organizations. There, I worked with projects management, sales and team leadership for 5 years. 

I am skilled in marketing and passionate about entrepreneurship, people and solving problems through products and solutions. I have 5 years of experience as Project Specialist for New Business.

I am a curious, dynamic and resourceful multilingual professional (Portuguese, English, and Spanish), hands-on, hard-working, and organized. I consistently work well both in teams and on self-initiated projects and my capacity to translate complex situations into simple and concrete steps has proved itself to be fruitful.

I have demonstrated strengths within key areas of marketing such as relationship strategies, sales, new business, and product implementation. I have consistently been a high performer in all of my positions, always focusing on making customer journeys easier, leaner, simpler, and, most importantly, human.
I am honored to have worked for different companies and clients. 

✔ Career Highlights
-> Led marketing and sales restructure – contracts, strategic partnership, training team and business presentations to gain productivity
-> Founded and managed 1 company for 5 years
-> Performed as Social Media Coordinator, putting the customer’s brand in the spotlight   
->Leveraged exceptional investigative and communications skills to increase networking and partnership possibilities to my clients 

I am passionate about travels and culture. At the beginning of 2014, I took a sabbatical of 6 months to travel in Latin America (Argentina and Chile). I now plan to relocate to gain essential international exposure.

Please do not hesitate to contact me, as I am open to new opportunities to join a dynamic company.

profile_positions.description:
Role: Responsible for understanding the customer goals and outcomes for a product and for maximizing the business value of the team’s work, translating complex situations to more simple and clear language. Experience in different projects in the financial and retail field and acted in a cross-functional business, design and technical team to identify opportunities that meet customer needs. Also an expert managing project schedules using agile methodologies and uses her communications skills to increase confidence between team members and clients.

- Defines and prioritises the Backlog that drives the team’s delivery of business/customer value. Has vet over the stories and priorities within the Backlog.
- Ensures that the Product Roadmap and Backlog is visible, transparent, and clear to all.
- Ensures the team understands items in the Product Backlog to the level needed.
- Talks directly and frequently with customers/users, other team members & stakeholders.
- Communication a shared product vision, with a strategy to get there		
- Gains buy-in and support from product stakeholders across the organization
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Role: Actuation in a cross-functional business, design and technical team to identify opportunities that meet customer needs and strategic goals, maximising the business value of the product

Projects:
Client - Nestlé
Role: Senior Product Manager
August 2023 - December 2023
Design, Strategy, Roadmap, Ecosystem, Stakeholder Management

Nestlé, the largest food and beverage company in the world had the proposal to optimize the digital ecosystem and to generate new business models for the next 5 years. The intention is to translate into the digital world the brand’s strength from the physical environment and fortify relationships with their consumers. Towards that scenario, the role was understanding the business and customer goals and ensuring the team understands items in the Product Backlog to the level needed, making sure that the Product Roadmap and Backlog is visible, transparent and clear to all. Besides that, talks directly and frequently with customers/users, other team members & stakeholders management. Communication was the key for this project, sharing product vision, with a strategy to get there.

Client - Santander Brazil
Role: Project/Product Manager
May 2021- August 2022
Project Manager, Design, Strategy, Roadmap, Stakeholder Management and Team building

Santander Brazil is the Brazilian subsidiary of the Spanish Santander Group, headquartered in São Paulo. My main responsibility is to align the business goals with the customer’s needs to deliver outstanding work on the Way Card app. Responsible for defining and prioritizing the Backlog that drives the team’s delivery of business/customer value in the continuous delivery. Stakeholders management is also part of my responsibility, negotiating with a big number of people involved in the project and schedules management.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description: Role: Responsible for defines and prioritises the Backlog that drives the team’s delivery of business/customer value. Has veto over the stories and priorities within the Backlog.
profile_positions.title: Project Mananager

profile_positions.description:
During 10 years I had created and run 3 different companies which gave me the opportunity to improve business insight, managing team, capacity of negotiation and to materialize ideas into business.

● Capim Dourado Kids (2017-2020)
Company creating children’s parties for the luxury market

● Comunikka Consultant (2015-2017) Projects of implementation new products

● Social Comunica and Wedding Comunica (2010-2014)
Communications project for social media and specialized in companies that operate in the wedding segment

Entrepreneur, Project Manager, Strategy, Leadership
